message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it is valued at $1800000. We are confident it will be a valuable addition to your business or lifestyle. Let's discuss how we can make this opportunity beneficial for both parties.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've placed on this product, my budget for this purchase is unfortunately capped at $1500000. I'm confident this is still a fair price given the market and my need for this product. Would you be open to considering this price?
